name: Pac-Man Collection
overview: The Pac is back in OpCode's latest release for the ColecoVision Game System. As the varacious Pac-Man or his sharpely bride-to-be Ms. Pac-Man, you've got to feed your face while staying one step ahead of the ghost monsters patroling the maze. Will you slip through the warp tunnel for a quick escape or risk it all for a templing fruit prize hanging just out for a reach ?. It's up to you in Pac-Man Collection !
